item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 22, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Slow deployment causes meetings (2015) (20 points | 4 comments)
2. A data table thousands of years old (2020) (134 points | 42 comments)
3. Keeping a Changelog at Work (2020) (46 points | 16 comments)

6. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (96 points | 51 comments)

13. Rosetta 2 creator leaves Apple to work on Lean full-time (69 points | 21 comments)

22. Talking over a wall changed my direction as a programmer (73 points | 34 comments)
23. Language and Personality (15 points | 11 comments)
24. Grammarly acquires Coda (101 points | 64 comments)
25. Translating 10M lines of Java to Kotlin (93 points | 79 comments)
26. Cqd: Colour my __dir__ please (18 points | 3 comments)
